In section 3.1.0.1.5 HTTP Status Codes "The OperationOutcome may be returned with any HTTP 4xx or 5xx response, but this is not requiredâ€¦"
Later, in 3.1.0.1.8, it states "In case of failure, servers SHOULD always return a body that contains an OperationOutcome resource."

So MAY be returned or SHOULD be returned, I see some inconsistency here.
subtle, but yes there is some inconsistency. do you want to propose a change? (bottom of the page)
